mapper.select: SELECT w.work_order_id, w.stock_id, s.stock_name, w.emp_id, hr.emp_name, w.start_date, w.due_date, w.target_qty, w.good_qty, w.defect_qty, w.request_date, CASE WHEN w.order_status = 0 THEN '대기' WHEN w.order_status = 1 THEN '진행중' WHEN w.order_status = 2 THEN '완료' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS order_status FROM work_order w LEFT JOIN stock s ON w.stock_id = s.stock_id LEFT JOIN human_resource hr ON w.emp_id = hr.emp_id WHERE w.work_order_id = #{work_order_id}
SELECT d.defect_id, d.lot_id, d.defect_qty, d.defect_date, l.work_order_id, l.stock_id FROM defect d JOIN lot l ON d.lot_id = l.lot_id WHERE l.work_order_id = #{work_order_id}

SELECT b.bom_id, b.parent_stock_id, s_parent.stock_name AS parent_stock_name, b.child_stock_id, s_child.stock_name AS child_stock_name, b.required_qty FROM bom b LEFT JOIN stock s_parent ON b.parent_stock_id = s_parent.stock_id LEFT JOIN stock s_child ON b.child_stock_id = s_child.stock_id
AND s_parent.stock_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parent_stock_name}, '%')
AND s_child.stock_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{child_stock_name}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bom (parent_stock_id, child_stock_id, required_qty) VALUES (#{parent_stock_id}, #{child_stock_id}, #{required_qty})
mapper.delete: DELETE d FROM defect d JOIN lot l ON d.lot_id = l.lot_id WHERE l.work_order_id = #{work_order_id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.bom_id, b.parent_stock_id, s_parent.stock_name AS parent_stock_name, b.child_stock_id, s_child.stock_name AS child_stock_name, b.required_qty FROM bom b LEFT JOIN stock s_parent ON b.parent_stock_id = s_parent.stock_id LEFT JOIN stock s_child ON b.child_stock_id = s_child.stock_id WHERE b.bom_id = #{bom_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lot (work_order_id, stock_id, lot_qty, lot_date) VALUES (#{work_order_id}, #{stock_id}, #{lot_qty}, #{lot_date})
mapper.select: SELECT lot_id, work_order_id, stock_id, lot_qty, lot_date FROM lot WHERE work_order_id = #{work_order_id} ORDER BY lot_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO defect (lot_id, defect_code, defect_qty, defect_date) VALUES (#{lot_id}, #{defect_code}, #{defect_qty}, #{defect_date})
